00048 class EffectNyquist: public Effect {
00049 
00050 public:
00051    
00052    EffectNyquist(wxString fname);
00053    virtual ~EffectNyquist();
00054 
00055    bool SetXlispPath();
00056 
00057    bool LoadedNyFile() {
00058       return mOK;
00059    }
00060 
00061    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00062       return mName;
00063    }
00064    
00065    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00066       return mCategories;
00067    }
00068 
00069    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00070       if (mInteractive) {
00071          // Disabled for now...
00072          return wxT("");
00073       }
00074       
00075       wxStringTokenizer st(mName, wxT(" "));
00076       wxString id;
00077 
00078       // CamelCase the name
00079       while (st.HasMoreTokens()) {
00080          wxString tok = st.GetNextToken();
00081 
00082          id += tok.Left(1).MakeUpper() + tok.Mid(1);
00083       }
00084 
00085       return id;
00086    }
00087    
00088    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00089       return mAction;
00090    }
00091    
00092    virtual bool PromptUser();
00093    
00094    virtual bool Process();
00095    
00096 private:
00097    
00098    int GetCallback(float *buffer, int channel,
00099                    long start, long len);
00100    int PutCallback(float *buffer, int channel,
00101                    long start, long len);
00102 
00103    static int StaticGetCallback(float *buffer, int channel,
00104                                 long start, long len,
00105                                 void *userdata);
00106    static int StaticPutCallback(float *buffer, int channel,
00107                                 long start, long len,
00108                                 void *userdata);
00109 
00110    bool       ProcessOne();
00111 
00112    void       Parse(wxString line);
00113    void       ParseFile();
00114    wxString   UnQuote(wxString s);
00115    double     GetCtrlValue(wxString s);
00116 
00117    static wxString  mXlispPath;
00118 
00119    wxFileName       mFileName;
00120    wxDateTime       mFileModified;
00121 
00122    bool             mInteractive;
00123    bool             mOK;
00124    wxString         mCmd;
00125    wxString         mName;
00126    wxString         mAction;
00127    wxString         mInfo;
00128    bool             mDebug;
00129    wxString         mDebugOutput;
00130 
00131    NyqControlArray  mControls;
00132 
00133    int              mCurNumChannels;
00134    WaveTrack       *mCurTrack[2];
00135    sampleCount  mCurStart[2];
00136    sampleCount      mCurLen;
00137    double           mOutputTime;
00138    int              mCount;
00139    double           mProgress;
